actions.text: Amendment SA 3583, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 245.
Amendment SA 3583 proposed by Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S5031-5033, S5037-5038) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3583 proposed by Senator Carper.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3583, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 245.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3583, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 245.
